desc: Unburden your life with Exonera technology. Do more. Work anywhere. Create documents as fast as you can speak with Dragon speech recognition. Experience Inevidesk the virtual desktop platform for designers, architects, engineers and anyone needing a powerful workstation anywhere....

layout.text:
Exonera helps people in healthcare, education, legal practice and business do more with cloud infrastructure and speech recognition technology. It's good for you, business and the planet.

Like the sound of that?
